document.id: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R17-024
document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R17-024
Submittal for 23 USC 202 Tribal Transportation Planning (66K) and the Tribal Transportation Program (TTP)(6K1) Funding
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 1st day of September, 2017, the following Resolution was adopted:

container.heading: Submittal for 23 USC 202 Tribal Transportation Planning (66K) and the Tribal Transportation Program (TTP)(6K1) Funding

annotation.doc: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R17-024

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo') is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America; and

para.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo') is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America.

recital.text: the Council is authorized to make laws for the Pueblo de San Ildefonso pursuant to Section 5 of the Agreement, the governing document of the Pueblo; and

para.text: The Council is authorized to make laws for the Pueblo de San Ildefonso pursuant to Section 5 of the Agreement, the governing document of the Pueblo.

recital.text: under the authority granted by Chapter 2 of Title 23, United States Code, as amended by the Fixing America's Surface Transportation (FAST) Act, Pub. L. 114-94, and in accordance with the requirements of Public Law (Pub. L.) 93-638, as amended; 25 CFR Part 170 (TTP Regulations); the Southwest Regional Office, Department of Transportation (SWRO-DOT) hereby offers the Tribe the first right-of-refusal to contract available funds; and

para.text: Under the authority granted by Chapter 2 of Title 23, United States Code, as amended by the Fixing America's Surface Transportation (FAST) Act, Pub. L. 114-94, and in accordance with the requirements of Public Law (Pub. L.) 93-638, as amended; 25 CFR Part 170 (TTP Regulations); the Southwest Regional Office, Department of Transportation (SWRO-DOT) hereby offers the Tribe the first right-of-refusal to contract available funds.

recital.text: to contract the Tribal Transportation Planning (66K) and the Tribal Transportation Program (TTP)(6K1) funds, the Tribe is required to submit to the SWRO-DOT the following documents:

ul.li: TTP Tribal Transportation Improvement Plan (TTIP/Control Schedule)
Proposed Statement of Work for Planning, Design, Construction and/or Road Maintenance Supplemental
Tribal Resolution to Enter into a Pub. L. 93-638 contract

para.text: To contract the Tribal Transportation Planning (66K) and the Tribal Transportation Program (TTP)(6K1) funds, the Tribe is required to submit to the SWRO-DOT the following documents:
TTP Tribal Transportation Improvement Plan (TTIP/Control Schedule)
Proposed Statement of Work for Planning, Design, Construction and/or Road Maintenance Supplemental
Tribal Resolution to Enter into a Pub. L. 93-638 contract

recital.text: the SWRO-DOT encourages the Tribe to submit the TTP-TTIP/Control Schedule for review and approval; and

para.text: The SWRO-DOT encourages the Tribe to submit the TTP-TTIP/Control Schedule for review and approval.

recital.text: the Pueblo has prepared a TTP-TTIP/Control Schedule for the following projects:

para.text: The Pueblo has prepared a TTP-TTIP/Control Schedule for the following projects:

recital.text: that the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council hereby approves the FY2017-FY2021 Control Schedule, Statement of Work and Budgets (attached); and

section.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council hereby approves the FY2017-FY2021 Control Schedule, Statement of Work and Budgets (attached).

recital.text: that the Pueblo request to enter into a new Pub. L. 93-638 contract with the funds; and

section.text: The Pueblo request to enter into a new Pub. L. 93-638 contract with the funds.

recital.text: that the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council hereby approves and adopts this resolution in accordance with the requirements of the Agreement, according to published Council procedures, and authorizes and directs the Governor, or his designee, to take such actions as deemed necessary to carry out the intent of this resolution.

section.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council hereby approves and adopts this resolution in accordance with the requirements of the Agreement, according to published Council procedures, and authorizes and directs the Governor, or his designee, to take such actions as deemed necessary to carry out the intent of this resolution.

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on September 1, 2017, at a meeting with a vote of in favor, opposed, abstaining and absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
COUNCIL REPRESENTATIVE SPONSOR(S): CR Thomas Gonzales
DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

Resolution No. SI-R17-024 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 1st day of September, 2017, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4(c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.
{ } VETO - RETURNED TO COUNCIL WITH EXPLANATION:
Presented by the Governor to the Council on the _______ day of ________________, 2017.

The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on _________________, 2017, at a meeting with a vote of ______ in favor, _____ opposed, _____ abstaining and _____ absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
